component.name: createATransfer
component.description: To send funds from your Stripe account to a third-party recipient or to your own bank account

component.name: retrieveAnExistingTransfer
component.description: Retrieve the details of an existing transfer

component.name: cancelATransfer
component.description: Cancels a transfer that has previously been created

component.name: getAListOfAllTransfers
component.description: Returns a list of your transfers
